name: Beard Splurge!
description:
Always using specimens from the natural world, Pretty Hole Collective's  Vetiver/Southernwood oil mixture steep for one Moon cycle, making a fine Biodynamic base for man-inspired grooming products:

Beard Splurge! : A Beard Treatment : A special formula that tones the skin underneath, conditions your fur, uplifts and grounds your spirit.  Wild-crafted Southernwood stimulates beard growth.  Using 5-10 drops to start, massage the skin, working down through the beard to the tips. Shake well and use as desired.

name: Beard Splash!
description:
Always using specimens from the natural world, Pretty Hole Collective's Vetiver-infused witch-hazel steeps for one Moon cycle, making a fine Biodynamic base for man-inspired grooming products:

Beard Splash! : An After-No-Shave:  A new take on an old classic.  Use at least once daily on the skin underneath your stubble, growing or trimmed beard.  Beard Splash tones your skin and uplifts your spirit.  Also great for use between shaves or before a night out.  Shake well.

name: Pyrite Essence Spray
description:
PHC's Essence Sprays are designed to traverse the boundaries of Gender & Function.  Different from traditional perfumes, these sprays quickly Shift our Energy, Raise our Vibration & help Keep Us Present.  Great for travel, shake well & use often.

Ingredients: Super Moon 2013 Pyrite Sun Essence with Essential Oils of Spruce, Vanilla, Palo Santo & Clove, with distilled water, preserved with local Austin gluten-free vodka.  Biodynamic.

name: Chaga Usnea Rose w/Black Tourmaline Herbal Extract
description:
Gentle Tonic to Help Let Go of the Tough Stuff  ::  
Boost Your Physical & Psychic Immunity

Chaga Mushroom, Wild-crafted Usnea, Organic Rose Petals infused with Black Tourmaline preserved in gluten-free vodka and distilled water.

Take 2 droppers full 2 times per day, or as professionally advised.

2 oz bottle Limited Release
